synopsis.text: Karina's mysterious death and the disappearance of a demonic object set the stage for a thrilling narrative in this anime. Set in 2007, the story unfolds as the Punishment of Sexual Perversions Law comes into effect, and a squadron known as 'Project K' begins rounding up suspected perverts. Amidst this chaos, Inukami Master Keita and Inukami Yoko find themselves on the run, labeled as Class A perverts. As they navigate through the city, they become the last hope for pervert-kind, while also trying to unravel the truth behind Karina's death. Meanwhile, Kaoru and his ten Inukami grow suspicious of the circumstances surrounding Karina's demise. With perverts being targeted and the fate of Keita and Yoko hanging in the balance, this anime promises a thrilling ride filled with suspense and intrigue.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
